action.content:
Please help me with the following task. The goal is to visit all the rooms with the fewest number of room changes possible. In each room, you need to decide the direction to go in. Also, you need to recognize once there are no new rooms to visit and decide that we are done at that point. Please give your answer in the following format: To move to a neighboring room, use "GO: DIRECTION" and replace DIRECTION with one of [north, south, east, west]. To stop the exploration, answer with "DONE" instead. Omit any other text.
Here is an example:
You are in the Kitchen. Currently available directions: south, west. What is your next instruction?
GO: west
You have made a step and entered a Lobby. Currently available directions: east, north. What is your next instruction?
GO: north
...
You have made a step and entered a Bedroom. Currently available directions: south. What is your next instruction?
DONE
Let us start. You are in the Nursery. Currently available directions: west. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Balcony. Currently available directions: south, north, west, east. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Balcony. Currently available directions: south, north, west, east. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Conservatory. Currently available directions: south, west. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Conservatory. Currently available directions: south, west. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Library. Currently available directions: south, east. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Library. Currently available directions: south, east. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Conservatory. Currently available directions: south, west. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Conservatory. Currently available directions: south, west. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Balcony. Currently available directions: south, north, west, east. What is your next instruction?
You have made a step and entered Balcony. Currently available directions: south, north, west, east. What is your next instruction?

GO: east

You have made a step and entered Living Room. Currently available directions: south, east. What is your next instruction?

GO: south

You have made a step and entered Kitchen. Currently available directions: west, south. What is your next instruction?

GO: west

You have made a step and entered Nursery. You have visited this room before. Currently available directions: west. DONE
